events.message: I want to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week because it does not fit and I no longer want to keep it.
The system has identified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding returning the jacket.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order #45231.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer care. I understand you would like a refund for your recent purchase. I am here to help you with that.
Could you please confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging so we can process the refund promptly?
Yes, the jacket is still unused and in its original packaging. I have kept all the tags attached as well.
Thank you for confirming. We will provide you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket, and once received, we will issue the full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect. I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions for returning the jacket.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for the excellent customer service throughout the process!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
The customer completed the feedback survey, rating their experience very positively and commenting favorably on the refund process.
The refund case has been successfully closed following positive customer feedback and confirmation of refund receipt.
The completed refund case has been archived in the customer support system for future reference.
